hero_image.alt: Hero image for Washdown Rated Sensors for Food Processing in Australia: The Definitive Guide to Hygienic Reliability

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution image inside a modern Australian food processing facility. The scene focuses on a stainless steel conveyor line carrying generic bottled products. In the foreground, a close-up of a robust, cylindrical 316L stainless steel sensor mounted near the conveyor belt, glistening slightly as if recently cleaned. In the background, a diverse maintenance team (a man and a woman) wearing full food-grade PPE (white coats, hairnets, safety glasses, high-vis vests) are inspecting a tablet device (viewed from the back, screen hidden) while looking at the machinery. The lighting is bright, clinical, and cool-toned, emphasizing hygiene and technology. No text or logos visible.
